scripts.deploy: npm i npm-add-dependencies -g && npm i npm-check-updates -g && npm i nodemon -g && npm i extends-classes -g && npm i && npm link webpack && npm link webpack-cli
scripts.start: ncu -u "/^(jfactory|wf)-.*$/" && npm update && (set NODE_ENV=production) && webpack --silent --watch | nodemon --watch ./dist index.js
scripts.dev: ncu -u -n "/^(jfactory|wf)-.*$/" && npm update && (set NODE_ENV=development) && webpack --watch | nodemon --watch ./dist --inspect index.js
